entry.title: Japan's Male-Dominated Ruling Party Takes a Chance on a Young Mother
entry.content: Maiko Takahashi is one of a rare breed in Japanâ€”a young mother and political newcomer running for the long-ruling LDP. Her race is among the battlegrounds that will decide whether new Prime Minister Fumio Kishida keeps his job.

entry.title: Severe Drought Hits South America
entry.content: A shortage of rainfall has left parts of South America in drought, hindering a huge hydroelectric dam in Paraguay and impeding the river transport of goods.
